name: Flappy Orbit
description:
Made in only 72 hours
for the ScoreSpace Jam #7
Theme: GAVITY!
6th Place

Controls:

Spacebar - Hold to orbit around planets


How to play:

Navigate your ship to avoid collisions with dangerous space debris (and planets obviously).
To restore HP (and Speed) salvage wrenches and other items with a green outline.


Score:

Orbiting alone will give you a decent amount of points.
But if you want to make it to a top leaderboard position you need to hunt down the healing items (green outline) to gain speed, increase your combo multiplier and get some bonus points for courage.

Credits:

Music by Alexander Nakarada
